mapper.insert: insert into free_reply (frno, fno, id, reply) values (seq_free_reply.nextval, #{fno}, #{id}, #{reply})
mapper.select: select frno, fno, id, frno2, reply, layer, nick, regdt, uptdt, deldt from free_reply where id=#{id} and deldt is null union all select mrno, mno, id, mrno2, reply, layer, nick, regdt, uptdt, deldt from meet_reply where id=#{id} and deldt is null order by regdt
select r.fno, f.deldt from free_reply r, free f where (r.id = #{id}) and (r.fno=f.fno) union all select e.mno, m.deldt from meet_reply e, meet m where (e.id = #{id}) and (e.mno=m.mno)
